name: PBR (post LudumDare41)
description:
Made during the 41st LudumDare with my friends.
This game mixing a simple 2D racing game with a puzzle game.

You've got to use colour keys to pass through doors of the same colour.

Gamepad allowed.

Version after the Jam here : https://lorenzocarly.itch.io/pbr. 

We will come back for a higlty better version soon !
